channel.title: MY new project

item.title: MY new project
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

Ok so my server… i want it to be bigg and good to play, the main thing atm is the weapons timers and animations…so

im guna make a small project, for the ppl who contribute thay will get a reward if thay join my server ( when its its out )

sofar… i got this and the main goal is to get most of the dragon weapons working first

Then mabey we can all work on the weapons in the middle

Here whats i got… RIP IT AND CLAIM IT AS YOUR OWN AND YOUR DEAD!

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) //full rune and scimi here
if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == (1127))
if(playerEquipment[playerLegs] == (1079))
if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == (1201))
{
PkingDelay = 8;
wepdelay = 8;
}

{
PkingDelay = 12;
wepdelay = 10;
setAnimation(1658);
resetanim = 4;
}
